name: Baseball Home run - Baseball game - Sports and Fitness
summary: Step up to the plate in Baseball Home Run! Experience the thrill of realistic baseball in VR. Swing for the fences, master your baseball batting skills, and feel rush of hitting the perfect home run. With immersive environments, intuitive controls, and multiple game modes, Baseball Home Run brings the excitement of America’s favorite pastime right to your Meta Quest. Perfect for players of all skill levels, challenge yourself to improve your swing and achieve high scores. Ready to hit home run.
